isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Front Cover, Cooling System, and Related Components - Installation - Oil Pump Assembly

figure.caption: Oil pump housing plate and seal

step1.para: Install a new oil pump housing seal in the front cover and install the oil pump housing plate.

figure.caption: Vibration damper key, inner rotor, and washer seal

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, make sure used oil pump inner and outer rotors rotate in the same direction as before removal. See marks added during removal for proper rotor orientation.

step1.para: Slide oil pump inner rotor on the crankshaft oil pump spline drive.
Install washer seal with angled outer edge pointing out toward the front of the engine.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not mark or distort the crankshaft keyway groove during vibration damper key installation.

step1.para: Carefully tap the vibration damper key into the crankshaft keyway groove with a hammer.

note.para: MaxxForce™ 9 and 10 engines use a front oil seal with a POSE dust seal mounted on the damper hub wear sleeve. MaxxForce™ DT engines use a front oil seal without a dust seal.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, for MaxxForce™ 9 and 10 engines, replace the POSE dust seal and front oil seal as a set. For MaxxForce™ DT engines, only use a front oil seal designed to not use a matching dust seal.

figure.caption: Hydraulic sealant and front oil seal

step1.para: Apply Loctite 569 Hydraulic sealant to the outside edge of the front oil seal.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, wipe excess hydraulic sealant and other contaminates off the front oil seal inside sealing edge.

calloutgroup.callout1: Front Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer

step1.para:
Place oil pump and rotor housing, new front oil seal, and Front Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer
on press table.
Position oil pump housing on press table so housing mating surface is level and supported. Dowel pins should be recessed in press table openings.
Position press ram on the center of the Front Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer and carefully press the front oil seal into the oil pump housing until seal is fully seated.

figure.caption: Oil pump housing and rotor assembly

step1.para: Install a new oil pump seal in the oil pump and rotor housing groove.
Coat the outer rotor with clean engine oil.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, make sure used oil pump inner and outer rotors rotate in the same direction as before removal. See marks added during removal for proper rotor orientation.

step1.para: Install the outer rotor on the inner rotor.
Lightly coat the front oil seal inside sealing surface with clean engine oil.
Align two oil pump and rotor housing dowels with two front cover dowel holes and install oil pump and rotor housing.

figure.caption: Oil pump and rotor housing assembly

step1.para: Install four M8 x 25 bolts finger tight.
Install two M8 x 60 bolts finger tight.
Tighten four M8 x 25 bolts and two M8 x 60 bolts to special torque .
